JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Lead for Wind & Site and Solar, Denmark
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Blue Power Partners is advising worldwide leading developers, asset owners and technology companies within origination, development, construction and performance optimization of renewable energy projects. 

We are growing our activities within wind & solar resource modelling and energy yield assessment, and are looking for a senior specialist to front our clients and drive deliverables from our growing team of wind engineers and data analysts. Likewise, the development of new products and service offerings will come in as a natural part of your role. 

Working from our headquarters in Aalborg, the right candidate gets a unique opportunity to lead the strategic development of our talented team located in India and Denmark while engaging with world-leading renewable equity investors.

About You

As Blue Power Partners is advising leading equity investors on their investment decisions, you must possess a technical understanding of wind resource assessment, wind farm siting and energy yield assessment in combination with a solid financial and commercial understanding of the link to investor’s business case. 

Based on your proven experience, you must be confident in taking a cross-functional perspective on working with energy yield assessment and optimization of wind farm projects and ensuring that these are delivered using robust process frameworks. 

We value the right match of personal and professional skills and our ideal candidate would bring the following competencies to our team:

  • Knowledge of wind and solar resource modelling and energy yield assessment.
  • Experience with optimization of wind projects for lowest LCoE and highest value of energy. 
  • Understanding of PPAs, hedge agreements and other offtake concepts.
  • Preparation and presentation of decision material and analyses at investment committee meetings. 
  • Experience with fronting clients, lenders and other stakeholders during due diligence and financing of renewable projects. 

As a person you 

  • Set direction for project deliverables and ensure these are delivered in collaboration with your team on time using appropriate processes and methods. 
  • Are highly analytical and structured with an ability to prioritize activities during tight deadlines, such as financial close of projects. 
  • Can bridge communication between a technical and commercial team.
  • Enjoy working in a multi-cultural environment. 
  • Are a strong communicator with great interpersonal skills.

About the job

You will get to join a dedicated team and an aspiring department, and we are looking for you, who can take a leading role within our team. We offer an informal, collaborative environment that fosters the opportunity to challenge each other and share knowledge. 

In this role, you will get challenging opportunities and some of your responsibilities will come to include:

  • Fronting customers during execution of energy resource modelling projects, including wind and solar farm design optimization.  
  • Leading due diligence of wind and solar farm project from a wind/solar resource assessments and energy yield perspective.
  • Driving development and anchoring of process improvements including quality assurance of deliverables. 
  • Contribution to resource modelling and energy yield assessments during peak workloads. 

We are operating globally and therefore this position may require a flexible attitude from time to time.

Contact

 For additional information about this position, please contact Ingerd Soendergaard, Director - Onshore Wind & Solar Onshore Wind & Solar, ias@bluepp.dk
